locationModal.title: You don't know your coordinates ?
locationModal.hint_1: We will figure them out. It is necessary to enable the location permissions of your browser or device
locationModal.hint_2: If this doesn't work you can use Google Maps to get your coordinates

landing_text: Choose where you want to go from the following options
legislation_short_exp: Flying a drone must always be done in accordance with the legislation of the place where it flies. Always check the legislation before flying.
legislation_short_exp_2: Access the Global drone regulation database to consult the regulation of any country in the world.
name: Name
my_profile_tab_exp: From this tab you can check the information of your user profile. You can also edit your profile and update your information.
recommendation: We recommend you visit the about section to fully understand how the application works
search_tab_exp: From the search section you can find drone pilots in a certain location and contact them
terms_of_use: I accept the terms of use
title: Drones app
weather_short_exp: Check the weather conditions before flying and do not take unnecessary risks.
weather_instructions: Enter a city to check the weather forecast and flight conditions
